amendment.description: To clarify certain authorities relating to adoptions by members of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1430 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1430 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Nelson NE. (consideration: CR S8738-8739; text: CR S8739) To clarify certain authorities relating to adoptions by members of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1430 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1430 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Nelson NE.
